body_html:
We can close it. Wrapping img in tf.Variable() solved the issue. Although I am not sure if that is the way to do when in my application img comes from the Dataset and the whole function that ends with scatter_nd_update is a part of the pipeline (called with ds.map()).

I think we can close the ticket.
body_text:
We can close it. Wrapping img in tf.Variable() solved the issue. Although I am not sure if that is the way to do when in my application img comes from the Dataset and the whole function that ends with scatter_nd_update is a part of the pipeline (called with ds.map()).
I think we can close the ticket.
body:
We can close it. Wrapping `img` in `tf.Variable()` solved the issue. Although I am not sure if that is the way to do when in my application `img` comes from the Dataset and the whole function that ends with `scatter_nd_update` is a part of the pipeline (called with ds.map()).

I think we can close the ticket.
